data.prayer: Father, help the 4,664 believers in Molise to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Molise, Italy
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Molise, Italy know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 4,664 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Molise.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Molise, Italy.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Persian people might believe through him.
Spirit, make the church in Molise, Italy humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Molise that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Molise, Italy has a population of 320,200.

We estimate Molise has 4,664 people who might know Jesus, 255,766 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 59,770 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 68 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, 320,200 people live in the state of Molise. Please, give them 64 new simple churches this year.
